positionName: Accounting Associate - 6 month Temporary Full Time Contract
description:
A full time temporary contract opportunity has opened up on our Finance team for an Accounting Associate. This role will be primarily responsible for accounts payable administration, the accurate and timely assistance with the preparation of the monthly working papers and reconciliations, purchasing and procurement of laboratory materials and equipment and other assigned administrative related activities.
 
  The role is a temporary contract role for 6 months with the possibility of extension.
  
  
  Key Responsibilities:
 
  Handle assigned activities related to the accounts payable and purchasing cycle including:
  
 
  
   Matching invoices to purchase orders and supporting documents 
  Analysis of invoices and coordination of payment approval 
  Follow up with vendors & address vendor requests 
  As part of the Finance team, assist in the preparation of journals entries and maintain account reconciliations consistent with corporate accounting policies to ensure that tight timelines are met 
  Performing purchasing, procurement, shipping and receipt duties 
  Othr general office administration as requested
 
  
  
  Experience & Qualifications
  
  
  
  Diploma in Accounting 
  General understanding of internal controls & processes required 
  Proficiency in MS Office applications, particularly MS Excel at an advanced level is required 
  Advanced organizational skills to independently manage multiple initiatives, adapt to changing priorities and produce high-quality deliverables against pressured time commitments 
  Excellent command of English, both verbal and in writing.
 
  
  
  At VBI, we believe diversity strengthens our team – innovation, creativity, and progress are dependent on the insight and experience that comes from a team with different backgrounds, beliefs, and cultures. We are proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and committed to creating an inclusive environment.
